## What is this?
VALORANT rank yoinker (vRY) is a tool that displays real-time rank, headshot %, winrate, peak rank, and loadout info for all players in your current VALORANT match. This release includes a native GUI window powered by Edge WebView2 â€” no browser or terminal needed.

## Changelog

## Installation
### Recommended: Installer
1. Download `vry-{version}-setup.exe`
2. Run the installer and follow the prompts
3. Launch vry from the desktop shortcut or Start Menu

### Portable
1. Download `vry-{version}-portable.zip`
2. Extract the zip to a folder of your choice
3. Run `vry.exe` from the extracted folder

## Requirements
- Windows 10/11
- VALORANT running
- [Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable](https://github.com/abbodi1406/vcredist/releases)

## Notes
- Config is created automatically on first run
- Logs are saved in `%AppData%\vry\logs`
